Perform the following tasks to complete this challenge:</p>
<ol>
<li>Use <code>console.log()</code> to print <code>Hello, World!</code> on a new line in the console, which is also known as <em>stdout</em> or <em>standard output</em>. The code for this portion of the task is already provided in the editor.</li>
<li>Use <code>console.log()</code> to print the contents of <em>parameterVariable</em> <span>
</span> (i.e., the argument passed to <em>main</em>).</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Input Format</strong></p>
<table class="challenge-body-table">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Data Type</th>
      <th>Parameter</th>
      <th>Description</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td><code>string</code></td>
      <td><em>parameterVariable</em></td>
      <td>A single line of text containing one or more space-separated words.</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
<p><strong>Output Format</strong></p>
<p>Print the following two lines of output:</p>
<ol>
<li>On the first line, print <code>Hello, World!</code> (this is provided for you in the editor).</li>
<li>On the second line, print the contents of <em>parameterVariable</em>.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Sample Input </strong></p>
<div><pre><span>Welcome to 10 Days of JavaScript!</span>
</pre></div>
<p><strong>Sample Output </strong></p>
<div ><pre><span >Hello, World!</span>
<span class="err">Welcome to 10 Days of JavaScript!</span>
</pre></div>
